MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G43 area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:05pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the repairs required to our underground electricity network near the Cogan Street substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:31pm on Monday, 14 December 2020
